definitions.text: the state of affairs that a plan is intended to achieve and that (when achieved) terminates behavior intended to achieve it
the place designated as the end (as of a race or journey)
examples: a crowd assembled at the finish
he was nearly exhausted as their destination came into view

definitions.text: game equipment consisting of the place toward which players of a game try to advance a ball or puck in order to score points

examples: the winning goal came with less than a minute left to play
